verses.verse: And this is the b'rakhah <WH1293>, wherewith Mosheh <WH4872> the man <WH376> of 'Elohim <WH430> blessed <WH1288> <WH8765> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> before <WH6440> his death <WH4194>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, The YY <WH3068> came <WH935> <WH8804> from Sinai <WH5514>, and rose up <WH2224> <WH8804> from Seir <WH8165> unto them; he shined forth <WH3313> <WH8689> from mount <WH2022> Paran <WH6290>, and he came <WH857> <WH8804> with ten thousands <WH7233> of saints <WH6944>: from his right hand <WH3225> went a fiery <WH799> <WH8676> <WH784> Torah <WH1881> for them.

Yea <WH637>, he loved <WH2245> <WH8801> the people <WH5971>; all his saints <WH6918> are in thy hand <WH3027>: and they sat down <WH8497> <WH8795> at thy feet <WH7272>; every one shall receive <WH5375> <WH8799> of thy words <WH1703>.
Mosheh <WH4872> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> us a Torah <WH8451>, even the inheritance <WH4181> of the congregation <WH6952> of Ya`akov <WH3290>.
And he was king <WH4428> in Yeshurun <WH3484>, when the heads <WH7218> of the people <WH5971> and the tribes <WH7626> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> were gathered <WH622> <WH8692> together <WH3162>.
Let Re'uven <WH7205> live <WH2421> <WH8799>, and not die <WH4191> <WH8799>; and let not his men <WH4962> be few <WH4557>.

And this is the b'rakhah of Y'hudah <WH3063>: and he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Hear <WH8085> <WH8798>, YY <WH3068>, the voice <WH6963> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, and bring <WH935> <WH8686> him unto his people <WH5971>: let his hands <WH3027> be sufficient <WH7227> for him; and be thou an help <WH5828> to him from his enemies <WH6862>.

And of Levi <WH3878> he said <WH559> <WH8804>, Let thy Thummim <WH8550> and thy Urim <WH224> be with thy holy <WH2623> one <WH376>, whom thou didst prove <WH5254> <WH8765> at Massah <WH4532>, and with whom thou didst strive <WH7378> <WH8799> at the waters <WH4325> of Meribah <WH4809>;

Who said <WH559> <WH8802> unto his father <WH1> and to his mother <WH517>, I have not seen <WH7200> <WH8804> him; neither did he acknowledge <WH5234> <WH8689> his brethren <WH251>, nor knew <WH3045> <WH8804> his own children <WH1121>: for they have observed <WH8104> <WH8804> thy word <WH565>, and kept <WH5341> <WH8799> thy covenant <WH1285>.

They shall teach <WH3384> <WH8686> Ya`akov <WH3290> thy judgments <WH4941>, and Yisra'EL <WH3478> thy Torah <WH8451>: they shall put <WH7760> <WH8799> incense <WH6988> before <WH639> thee, and whole burnt sacrifice <WH3632> upon thine altar <WH4196>.

Bless <WH1288> <WH8761>, YY <WH3068>, his substance <WH2428>, and accept <WH7521> <WH8799> the work <WH6467> of his hands <WH3027>: smite <WH4272> <WH8798> through the loins <WH4975> of them that rise <WH6965> <WH8801> against him, and of them that hate <WH8130> <WH8764> him, that they rise <WH6965> not <WH4480> again <WH6965> <WH8799>.

And of Binyamin <WH1144> he said <WH559> <WH8804>, The beloved <WH3039> of the YY <WH3068> shall dwell <WH7931> <WH8799> in safety <WH983> by him; and the YY shall cover <WH2653> <WH8802> him all the day <WH3117> long, and he shall dwell <WH7931> <WH8804> between his shoulders <WH3802>.

And of Yosef <WH3130> he said <WH559> <WH8804>, Blessed <WH1288> <WH8794> of the YY <WH3068> be his land <WH776>, for the precious things <WH4022> of heaven <WH8064>, for the dew <WH2919>, and for the deep <WH8415> that coucheth beneath <WH7257> <WH8802>,
And for the precious <WH4022> fruits <WH8393> brought forth by the sun <WH8121>, and for the precious things <WH4022> put forth <WH1645> by the moon <WH3391>,
And for the chief things <WH7218> of the ancient <WH6924> mountains <WH2042>, and for the precious things <WH4022> of the lasting <WH5769> hills <WH1389>,

And for the precious things <WH4022> of the earth <WH776> and fulness <WH4393> thereof, and for the good will <WH7522> of him that dwelt <WH7931> <WH8802> in the bush <WH5572>: let the b'rakhah come <WH935> <WH8799> upon the head <WH7218> of Yosef <WH3130>, and upon the top of the head <WH6936> of him that was separated <WH5139> from his brethren <WH251>.

His glory <WH1926> is like the firstling <WH1060> of his bullock <WH7794>, and his shofars <WH7161> are like the shofars <WH7161> of unicorns <WH7214>: with them he shall push <WH5055> <WH8762> the people <WH5971> together <WH3162> to the ends <WH657> of the earth <WH776>: and they are the ten thousands <WH7233> of Efrayim <WH669>, and they are the thousands <WH505> of M'nasheh <WH4519>.
And of Z'vulun <WH2074> he said <WH559> <WH8804>, Rejoice <WH8055> <WH8798>, Z'vulun <WH2074>, in thy going out <WH3318> <WH8800>; and, Yissakhar <WH3485>, in thy tents <WH168>.

They shall call <WH7121> <WH8799> the people <WH5971> unto the mountain <WH2022>; there they shall offer <WH2076> <WH8799> sacrifices <WH2077> of righteousness <WH6664>: for they shall suck <WH3243> <WH8799> of the abundance <WH8228> of the seas <WH3220>, and of treasures <WH8226> <WH8803> hid <WH2934> <WH8803> in the sand <WH2344>.

And of Gad <WH1410> he said <WH559> <WH8804>, Blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> be he that enlargeth <WH7337> <WH8688> Gad <WH1410>: he dwelleth <WH7931> <WH8804> as a lion <WH3833>, and teareth <WH2963> <WH8804> the arm <WH2220> with <WH637> the crown of the head <WH6936>.

And he provided <WH7200> <WH8799> the first part <WH7225> for himself, because there, in a portion <WH2513> of the Torahgiver <WH2710> <WH8781>, was he seated <WH5603> <WH8803>; and he came <WH857> <WH8799> with the heads <WH7218> of the people <WH5971>, he executed <WH6213> <WH8804> the justice <WH6666> of the YY <WH3068>, and his judgments <WH4941> with Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
And of Dan <WH1835> he said <WH559> <WH8804>, Dan <WH1835> is a lion's <WH738> whelp <WH1482>: he shall leap <WH2187> <WH8762> from Bashan <WH1316>.

And of Naftali <WH5321> he said <WH559> <WH8804>, O Naftali <WH5321>, satisfied <WH7649> with favour <WH7522>, and full <WH4392> with the b'rakhah <WH1293> of the YY <WH3068>: possess <WH3423> <WH8798> thou the west <WH3220> and the south <WH1864>.

And of Asher <WH836> he said <WH559> <WH8804>, Let Asher <WH836> be blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> with children <WH1121>; let him be acceptable <WH7521> <WH8803> to his brethren <WH251>, and let him dip <WH2881> <WH8802> his foot <WH7272> in oil <WH8081>.
Thy shoes <WH4515> shall be iron <WH1270> and brass <WH5178>; and as thy days <WH3117>, so shall thy strength <WH1679> be.
There is none like unto the 'Elohim <WH410> of Yeshurun <WH3484>, who rideth <WH7392> <WH8802> upon the heaven <WH8064> in thy help <WH5828>, and in his excellency <WH1346> on the sky <WH7834>.

The eternal <WH6924> 'Elohim <WH430> is thy refuge <WH4585>, and underneath are the everlasting <WH5769> arms <WH2220>: and he shall thrust out <WH1644> <WH8762> the enemy <WH341> <WH8802> from before <WH6440> thee; and shall say <WH559> <WH8799>, Destroy <WH8045> <WH8685> them.

Yisra'EL <WH3478> then shall dwell <WH7931> <WH8799> in safety <WH983> alone <WH910>: the fountain <WH5869> of Ya`akov <WH3290> shall be upon a land <WH776> of corn <WH1715> and wine <WH8492>; also his heavens <WH8064> shall drop down <WH6201> <WH8799> dew <WH2919>.

Happy <WH835> art thou, O Yisra'EL <WH3478>: who is like unto thee, O people <WH5971> saved <WH3467> <WH8737> by the YY <WH3068>, the shield <WH4043> of thy help <WH5828>, and who is the sword <WH2719> of thy excellency <WH1346> ! and thine enemies <WH341> <WH8802> shall be found liars <WH3584> <WH8735> unto thee; and thou shalt tread <WH1869> <WH8799> upon their high places <WH1116>.
